data.title: 6 Times Shah Rukh Khan and Salman Khan Cameoed in Each Other's Films
data.meta_description: A list of 3 SRK films and 3 Salman Khan films in which the other made cameos.
data.text:
Kuch Kuch Hota Hai (1998)

Decades before Pathaan and Tiger 3, the duo's on-screen bonhomie was seen when Salman Khan had an extended cameo in this classic SRK film as Aman Mehra, Anjali's good-natured fianc√©e

Har Dil Jo Pyar Karega... (2000)

Shah Rukh reprised the role of Rahul from Kuch Kuch Hota Hai for an iconic crossover scene in this Salman Khan movie also starring Rani Mukerji and Preity Zinta.

Tubelight (2017)

Kabir Khan's film saw Salman Khan in an experimental role as a mentally challenged man who gets motivated by Gogo Pasha, a magician played by Shah Rukh Khan.

Zero (2018)

This ambitious film of SRK's career featured a cameo from Salman Khan in the song 'Issaqbaazi' where he grooves to the tune, carrying a VFX-morphed Shah Rukh Khan in his lap.

Pathaan (2023)

Shah Rukh Khan's box office blockbuster had a memorable cameo from Salman as Tiger, in which they share a heartful moment and reflect on their decades long journey.
